DataElement.preferredName: Eligibility Criteria Corrected Prolonged QT Interval by ECG Finding Second Assessment Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical value of the second QTc assessment for study eligibility.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Corrected Prolonged QT Interval by ECG Finding Second Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._An electrocardiographic finding in which the QTc interval corrected for heart rate is prolonged. Thresholds for different age, gender, and patient populations exist. (CDISC)_Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.longName: Corrected Prolonged QT Interval by ECG Finding
Concepts.definition: An electrocardiographic finding in which the QTc interval corrected for heart rate is prolonged. Thresholds for different age, gender, and patient populations exist. (CDISC)
